name: CoccidioidomycosisTestsForCoccidioidesSpeciesIgGAntibody
title: Coccidioidomycosis (Tests for Coccidioides species IgG Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Coccidiodes species  IgG antibodies),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Coccidioides sp IgG/ Coccidioides immitis IgG),(Exclusion Criteria: panel test)
